gnat.server
Class GeneRepositoryService

java.lang.Object
  gnat.server.HttpService
      gnat.server.GeneRepositoryService

public class GeneRepositoryService
extends HttpService

Provides remote access to a local database on genes.
Accepts HTTP GET and POST request by GNAT clients and via standard HTTP (wget etc.).

Author:
Jörg Hakenberg <jhakenberg@users.sourceforge.net>
